img.div:
School Closure Extended
Stuart Packard
Wednesday, March 25, 2020
img.p: This is to inform you that the school closure has been extended at Buttonwillow School as well as all school districts in Kern County. The extension remains fluid and is tentatively scheduled through Friday, May 1.Â
Food Service will continue as schedules through Friday, May 1.
Distance learning with the teachers will continue through Friday, May 1.
Students will report back on Tuesday, May 5.
We will keep you informed should these dates change.
